snippet.title: Pixadom: The Cozy MMO That Feels Like a Warm Hug
snippet.description:
As a kid, do you remember playing games like Habbo Hotel, Coke Music, VMK, Toon Town, Spineworld, Pokemon and Club Penguin? When you think of those games, do they bring back that nostalgic feeling of wonder and warmth?

Well, Pixadom is here to satisfy your nostalgic cravings! It's a cozy 2D social pixel art MMO that blends the elements of all your favorite childhood games into one delightful package. Go on quests, collect and craft, create your own apartment, play minigames, battle monsters, fishing... it's all here!

It's FREE to play and works on PC, tablet or mobile. Give it a go today and reconnect with your inner child - you're never too old for a warm and toasty nostalgia-filled hug. ;)

Play now: https://www.pixadom.com
